awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: The 23rd Earl of Leete shares brief moments of his life, the truth behind his family estate and his particular glorious moment when he murdered his wife and his brother.
plot: The 23rd Earl of Leete shares brief moments of his life, the truth behind his family estate and his particular glorious moment when he murdered his wife and his brother.
title: A Sense of History
